snippet: According to a report by Enders Analysis, a British research firm, the challenge for Spotify is how to add paying customers without giving away too much of what the report calls "expensive free music."
abstract: According to a report by Enders Analysis, a British research firm, the challenge for Spotify is how to add paying customers without giving away too much of what the report calls "expensive free music."

headline.main: Spotify Is Said to Profit From Its Subscribers, but Lose More Luring Them
